name: monogamist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who is married to, or has a sexual relationship with, only one other person at a time: He is a monogamist who has been married five times.serial monogamist Many young people are serial monogamists, jumping straight from one serious relationship to the next.
More examplesFewer examplesHe seems to be a monogamist who takes his relationships very seriously.She considers herself a monogamist, intimate with just one other person. He was a serial monogamist and she was his latest partner.I didn't have a wife; I wasn't even a monogamist.I'm a monogamist and I don't even think about other women.
